nodes.text: A nut-paste sandwich was a type of sandwich that the Chiss were known to eat. On sky-walker Che'ri's first day aboard the Springhawk, her Caregiver, Mitth'ali'astov, considered making her a nut-paste sandwich.
Nut-paste sandwiches were mentioned in the 2020 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Chaos Rising, written by Timothy Zahn.
